name: Dragon Tower Defense
description:
Can you defeat all the waves and protect your home?!

Final Wave: Dragons

Controls:

  1. Left-click to purchase towers
  2. Left-click again to place towers

Camera Controls:

  • Move mouse to screen edges
  • Mouse wheel to zoom

Notes:

  • There are four waves, the last wave = dragons
  • Map is randomized each round
  • Still balancing
  • Any feedback on difficulty is appreciated

Team

Eunice (me) - Design, Code (creeps & map), Art (creeps)
Hsi Lin - Design, Code (tower & UI), Art (slow tower)
